1.suggestion: Because purple is the color of luxury, some people have abused it to express their status within society.

2.suggestion: darker shades can represent sadness and frustration. In some parts of Europe, purple is associated with death and mourning

3.suggestion: According to surveys, almost 75 percent of pre-adolescent children prefer purple to all other colors.

4.suggestion: For people in depressed states, purple can worsen their depression and make their condition even worse. That has been psychologically shown many times.
